item.title: Crawling through a web labyrinth using {rvest}
item.description: This is a brief walk through of the session functionality in {rvest} as used on a recent project involving data on the web hidden behind multiple layers of forms and file-download malarkey. It comes from a recent project where a periodically updated export of an online official database was needed. I worked on it as Hadley Wickham was updating rvest for release of version 1.0, so I got to test some new/redesigned features and workflows and report a few minor bugs along the way.
